<!-- MCP Validation Server Project Setup Instructions -->

## Project Overview
Building a Model Context Protocol (MCP) validation server in TypeScript that provides validation tools for email, phone, URL, and custom regex patterns.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [x] Clarify project requirements (MCP server with validation tools)
- [ ] Scaffold the project structure
- [ ] Customize the project with validation tools
- [ ] Install required dependencies
- [ ] Compile the TypeScript project
- [ ] Test MCP server functionality
- [ ] Complete documentation

## Project Details
- **Type**: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Key Dependencies**: @modelcontextprotocol/sdk, zod
- **Transport**: stdio
- **Tools**: Email, Phone, URL, Custom Regex validators
